about_the_game:
This DLC is the Supporter Edition of the game Slimesventure: Your Destination.

With your purchase you will have access to

Soundtracks

1. all of the music tracks that are available in the game. These can be found in the game's directory.

Desktop Backgrounds

2. exclusive wallpapers for your desktop, that covers the winter aspect of the new Update 1.5 WinterLife. These are different resolutions that cover FHD, WQHD and UHD. In later updates, the type of aspects will be extended. These can be found in the game's directory.

Exclusive Hat

3. Exclusive hat that are instantly available after purchase in-game. A classic winter hat in red!

Supporter Rank on Discord

4. Supporter Rank on the official Discord server. This allows you to get the latest information the quickest - please feel free to message the team to get this rank.

Immortalisation in Credits

5. Getting immortalised in the credits - The credits are updated with every new version of Slimesventure: Your Destination.

With your purchase you will be supporting the developers and enabling the further development of the game.
